conclusion: A skydiver jumps from a helicopter at high altitude. The v-t graph of his vertical movement is shown.
The graph shows velocity decreasing from 20 m/s to 10 m/s between 10 and 15 seconds.

premise: Velocity decreases from 20 m/s to 10 m/s.
conclusion: The average velocity during this interval is (20 m/s + 10 m/s) / 2 = 15 m/s.

premise: Average velocity is 15 m/s and time interval is 5 seconds.
conclusion: The distance fallen is 15 m/s * 5 s = 75 meters.

premise: Velocity is decreasing during the interval.
conclusion: The actual distance fallen is less than 75 meters.
